data.title: Doctor Strange: Through the Looking Glass (Marvelette film)
data.meta_description: Doctor Strange: Through the Looking Glass is a Marvelette Cinematic Universe Phase Six film. data.text:
Doctor Strange: Through the Looking Glass is a Marvelette Cinematic Universe Phase Six film. It was released on October 10th, 2025, following Nova and preceding Black Panther: Wakanda Forever. The film is directed by Scott Derrickson.

Cast[]

Benedict Cumberbatch as Doctor Stephen Strange

Benedict Cumberbatch as Dormammu

Chiwetel Ejiofor as Baron Karl Mordo (Death)

Lucy Liu as Clea

Benedict Wong as Wong

Rachel McAdams as Christine Palmer / Night Nurse

Ethan Hawke as Victor Strange (First Appearance) (Death)

Tim Curry as Mephistopheles

Jensen Ackles as Johnny Blaze / Ghost Rider (First Appearance)

Sam Witwer as Blackheart (First Appearance)

Jordana Brewster as Morgana Blessing (First Appearance)

Crew[]

Scott Derrickson: Writer, Director

Kid Marvelette: Executive Producer

Kevin Feige: Executive Producer

Trinh Tran: Producer

Victoria Alonso: Producer

Hans Zimmer: Composer

Plot[]

After finally amassing enough power from multiple sorcerers across the multiverse, Baron Mordo finally makes his move against Doctor Strange, but things get complicated when he becomes targeted by the Ghost Rider for failing to complete his deal with Mephisto!

Trivia[]
